Title: Relates to long range financial planning for school districts
Summary: Relates to long range financial planning for school districts; requires the superintendent of schools in consultation with the chief financial officer of each school district to prepare for approval by the board of trustees a three-year long-range financial plan to assist districts in establishing and planning financial goals and projections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to long range financial planning for school districts
